author: slaws
msg: Avoid NPE in test cases. Encountered when writing out the system definitions file to XML.

msg: [ESME-221] Makes Lift errors go away automatically

msg: Break the potential endless loop reported by Martin Hilpert.

msg: Big-bang change to move tests to JUnit 4 and standardize a bit along the way.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix a bug introduced by incomplete transition to single-DB, and add a test
for it as it wasn't found by the test suite.
(tweak_node): Assert that the caller didn't request the 'parent stub'.
(tweak_entries): Don't special-case a call to tweak_node().
(do_update_cleanup): Don't special-case a call to tweak_node().
